name: Name
question: Question
title: Title
warning-not-yet-joined-as-a-member: If you are not registered in this application, please register first.
view__guest__index__great__title: This application is an online coding learning platform, you can use it wherever and whenever you want. Join as a learner or as a material provider.
view__guest__index__info__instructor__de: As an instructor, offer your expertise to eager learners. Create and deliver engaging courses tailored to your niche, empowering students to achieve their goals and expand their knowledge under your guidance.
Set the price for your course content. Determine the value of your expertise and resources, ensuring fair compensation for your efforts while attracting interested learners.
Easily receive payments for your courses. Seamlessly integrate payment gateways to securely process transactions, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience for both you and your students.
view__guest__index__info__student__desc_: Find the perfect online course for you with this platform. Explore various options based on your interests and goals. With just a few clicks, you can choose a course that suits your preferences, empowering you to pursue your interests from anywhere.
Securely complete your transaction with ease. Choose your preferred payment method and make a swift, hassle-free payment to access your selected course or services.
Finish your learning journey with confidence. Access completion certificates, assessments, or follow-up resources to solidify your knowledge and skills.
Obtain your certificate upon course completion. Validate your skills and achievements with our accredited certification, enhancing your professional profile.
view__guest__index__instructor__desc: Join as our mentor and share your knowledge and experience with the next generation.
view__guest__index__instructor__title: Be part of an inspiring learning journey!
view__guest__index__next__step: You can try several free courses and get a certificate, for that please click the button below
view__member__general__forum__chat__warn: Chat is not available yet, please send a message to start a conversation and as a note, because this is the first time sending a message, please select the course category you want to discuss, thank you.
view__member__instructor__earnings__guid: For more details, please click on this
view__member__instructor__earnings__warn: You can withdraw the funds to your bank account, please click the button below
view__member__student__certificates__war: We noticed that you have not completed certification for the course you are taking. Remember, certification not only validates your learning but also showcases your skills to potential employers or peers. However, if you haven't purchased the course, please purchase it first.
view__member__student__courses__warning: Please note that purchasing courses in this app is completely optional. You are not required to make any purchases. If you choose not to buy anything, you can continue to enjoy the free courses provided by the instructor, press the free filter and get the certificate.
view__member__student__lesson__warning: The finish button will appear on the last page.
view__member__student__paid__warning_1: Click this button bellow if you want cancel payment method and make transaction again.
view__member__student__paid__warning_2: Your transaction will be deleted, and you will order from the beginning. Are you sure ?
view__member__student__question__value: Waiting for the instructor to answer
view__member__student__question__warning: It looks like you haven't submitted any questions yet. Don't worry, if you have any doubts or need clarification on any topic covered in this course, please ask the instructor. Questions can be made if you take a paid course provided by the instructor.
view__member__student__reviews__warning: It looks like you don't have any reviews yet. Instructor is working to collect student feedback to give you more insight. In the meantime, please explore other products or check back later for the latest information.
view__member__student__sections__warning: Complete all the material then you will get a certificate.
view__member__student__stashes__warning: Oops! It seems like there are no items in your stash/cart right now. Feel free to browse our collection and add some products to your stash/cart to continue shopping. If you need any assistance, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team. Happy shopping!
view__member__student__transactions__war: It appears that there haven't been any transactions made on your app recently. If you have any pending tasks or queries, feel free to reach out to our support team. Otherwise, continue enjoying our services hassle-free!
